Attached find copy of letter 2-18-7o from Dr. R. D. Carpenter of

I agree whole heartedly with Dr. Carpenter's recommendation.
Secondly, after discussions with Dr. Rosencrans of M.R.I. I find
that they do not have an adequate recorder for the I.R. analyzer. Therefore
an additional $2,00o.o0 would be required for the purchase of a reliable
This procedure would be used for all the smoking machines being
tested by M.R.I. before and during animal exposures.
Total amount to be requested not less than $4,50o.00.

full_text:
February 25, 1970
TO:
Dr. Arthur Furst
FROM:
V.F.L.
SUBJEcT: Recommendation for additional supportive equipment for contract
activities at Mason Research Institute.
Attached find copy of letter 2-18-7o from Dr. R. D. Carpenter of
Philip Morris to Dr. M. Senkus of Reynolds.
I agree whole heartedly with Dr. Carpenter's recommendation.
Secondly, after discussions with Dr. Rosencrans of M.R.I. I find
that they do not have an adequate recorder for the I.R. analyzer. Therefore
an additional $2,00o.o0 would be required for the purchase of a reliable
x y recorder.
This procedure would be used for all the smoking machines being
tested by M.R.I. before and during animal exposures.
Total amount to be requested not less than $4,50o.00.
V.F.L.
CTR CONTRACTS OOOB2O
